title: My skin is gone.
body:
During the winter, my friend has bought me old saint zilean, and it was working fine until today. I tried to play zilean and I wanted to use the skin, but it was just..gone.
http://i.imgur.com/aM1rXCa.jpg 

EDIT, THAT PHOTO THERE, ALL SKINS ABOVE ZILEAN ARE /GONE/. RIOT THATS OVER 70 BUCKS WORK. PLEASE HELP.

replies.body:
Hey Basco The Bear,

If a player participates in Refer-A-Friend fraud to acquire IP or RP, then any champions/skins gifted with this IP or RP are removed. If you don't think the removal of content is due to Refer-A-Friend abuse, please submit a [player support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
Quite a few posts have appeared about this topic and I feel like Rito needs to include some kind of a notification when removing skins from accounts instead of just randomly ninjaing them away.
Well thats not fun... any information on what happened?  Was it RAF fraud?
